name: Boomerampty
description:
❔What is this game?

This is an entry for TriJam #153, created in 2h02m using Crisp-game-lib

💬Synopsis

You are the only full being in an empty world. When you throw a boomerang, your "core" is transferred from your body to the boomerang, and your body becomes empty. Use this to your advantage and protect yourself from the flying empty balls!

🎮Controls
  • Hold to Charge Boomerang, Release to Throw. Tap again, and boomerang will come back.
🔍Credits
  • Game engine: Crisp-game-lib
  • Sound: Automatic generation by Crisp-game-lib
  • Translate this document: DeepL
  • Other tools: VSCod
